# VaultBridge Robots.txt
# https://vaultbridge.io

User-agent: *
Allow: /
Allow: /upload
Allow: /access
Allow: /live
Allow: /how-it-works
Allow: /terms
Allow: /privacy

# Disallow temporary/dynamic pages
Disallow: /download/
Disallow: /success/
Disallow: /live/

# Crawl delay (be respectful to server)
Crawl-delay: 1

# Sitemaps
Sitemap: https://vaultbridge.io/sitemap.xml
